thread.title: The Garage Makes People Lose Many Things, Fortunately, People Still Have Airwheel electric scooters
thread.title_full: The Garage Makes People Lose Many Things, Fortunately, People Still Have Airwheel electric scooters

title: The Garage Makes People Lose Many Things, Fortunately, People Still Have Airwheel electric scooters
text: The Garage Makes People Lose Many Things, Fortunately, People Still Have Airwheel electric scooters The garage might be the necessity for people with private cars, yet the garage wastes too much room in one's houses. Luckily, people still have Airwheel intelligent self-balancing scooters. USA, 15 October 2015 -- What if people carefully design their garages? There are many better usages of the garages than parking private cars—bathroom, bedroom, exercise room and living room. The creation of the owners can change their garages into better and more useful rooms for themselves. But the precondition is to own a “private cars” which are small and take little spaces in the houses. Luckily, Airwheel has provided people with the intelligent self-balancing scooters , which are absolutely powered by electricity and are the same powerful and helpful as traditional vehicles. The advantages of Airwheel intelligent self-balancing scooters comparing with traditional vehicles in body sizes are the key points for users to save spaces in their houses. Even the largest vehicles in Airwheel family—Airwheel S5 two-wheeled intelligent scooters , are not larger than the size of an . Moreover, the vehicle units like the control shaft are detachable and foldable. So Airwheel S5 two-wheeled intelligent scooters can even be stored in the back trunk of ones’ private cars. In one’s houses, Airwheel intelligent self-balancing scooters can be parked in any corner of the houses. The small sizes of Airwheel Self-balancing Electric scooters will make people forget them when they do not need them.But, small body sizes don’t necessarily mean weak performances. Airwheel electric self-balancing scooters have the amazing performances, which will surprise riders when they set their feet on the pedals or standing board of the vehicles. Airwheel X5 electric unicycles are the vehicles with single wheels but the extreme portability which people can never experience on other vehicles—everyone can carry X5 scooters to anywhere people can get in; and X5 can be stored in any places like the locker in the super market. But in such a small vehicle body, Airwheel adopted the battery cores from Sony and the advanced noise-free maglev motor which are silent and efficient. X5 can bear the burden capacity of 120kg for 120 km at a speed of 18km/h. They are the true vehicles for people. Airwheel intelligent scooters are the vehicles offering people more spaces in their houses. # # #
